Uses of Interface
java.awt.datatransfer.FlavorListener

  • Packages that use FlavorListener 
    Package Description
    java.awt.datatransfer
    Provides interfaces and classes for transferring data between and within applications.

    • Uses of FlavorListener in java.awt.datatransfer

      Methods in java.awt.datatransfer that return FlavorListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlavorListener[] Clipboard.getFlavorListeners()
      Returns an array of all the FlavorListeners currently registered on this Clipboard.
      Methods in java.awt.datatransfer with parameters of type FlavorListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Clipboard.addFlavorListener(FlavorListener listener)
      Registers the specified FlavorListener to receive FlavorEvents from this clipboard.
      void Clipboard.removeFlavorListener(FlavorListener listener)
      Removes the specified FlavorListener so that it no longer receives FlavorEvents from this Clipboard.
